tuv.seg: European elections - counting the votes
Toghcháin Eorpacha- na vótaí a chomhaireamh
The result of a European election cannot be declared until voting throughout the European Union is completed
Ní féidir le comhaireamh toradh toghcháin Eorpach a fhógairt go mbeidh na vótaí ar fad ar fud an AE caite
The ballot papers are sent to the count centre for each constituency
Cuirtear na páipéir bhallóide chuig an ionad comhairimh do gach toghcheantar
The candidate’s agents are allowed to supervise the count
Ceadaítear ionadaithe na n-iarrthóirí maoirseacht ar an gcomhaireamh a dhéanamh
Each ballot box is opened and the number of ballot papers in each box is checked against the return furnished by the presiding officer
Osclaítear gach bosca ballóide agus tá an méid páipéar i ngach bosca seiceáilte le cinntiú gur ionann agus líon na vótaí atá i gcuntas gach oifigeach i gceannas
All the ballot papers are then mixed and sorted
Déantar na páipéir bhallóide a meascadh agus a shórtáil
Invalid papers are rejected
Ní ghlactar le páipéir nach bhfuil bailí
Counting continues until all the seats have been filled
Leantar le comhaireamh na vótaí go dtí go mbíonn na suíocháin ar fad líonta
The returning officer may recount all or any of the papers at any stage of a count
Is féidir le ceann comhairimh na vótaí ar fad nó cuid acu a athchomhaireamh ag am ar bith le linn an chomhairimh
A candidate or their agent is entitled to ask for a recount of the papers
Tá sé de chead ag iarrthóir nó ag a (h)ionadaí iarratas a dhéanamh na vótaí a athchomhaireamh
When the count is completed, the returning officer declares the results of the election
Nuair atá an comhaireamh críochnaithe fógraíonn an ceann comhairimh toradh an toghcháin
The result cannot be declared until polling has closed in every EU member state
Ní féidir le toradh bheith fógartha go mbeidh deireadh na vótaíochta i ngach ballstáit AE
The electoral system is proportional representation with single transferable vote (PR-STV)
Is ionadaíocht chionmhar le vóta amháin inaistrithe (PR-STV) é an córas vótála atá againn
The first step in the process is that the quota is worked out
Mar chéad chéim sa phróiséas seo déantar an cuóta a oibriú amach
The quota is the minimum number of votes necessary to guarantee the election of a candidate
An líon is mó vótaí a theastaíonn le iarrthóir a thoghadh is brí leis an gcuóta
It is calculated by dividing the total number of valid papers by one more than the number of seats to be filled and adding one to the result
Déantar líon iomlán na bpáipéar bailí a roinnt faoin méid suíochán móide 1 atá le líonadh agus cuirtear 1 leis an bhfigiúr sin
For example, if there are 1,000 valid ballot papers and there are 4 seats in the constituency, the quota is 1000 ÷ 4 +1 = 200 + 1 = 201
Mar shampla, má tá 1,000 páipéir bhallóide bailí ann agus ceithre shuíochán sa toghcheantar seo a leanas an cuóta 1000 ÷ 4 +1 = 200 + 1 = 201
The quota is 201
Is é 201 an cuóta
The ballot papers are sorted according to the first preferences recorded for each candidate and counted
Déantar na páipéir bhallóide a shórtáil ansin de réir na n-iarrthóirí a fuair an chéad rogha agus déantar na vótaí sin a chomhaireamh
At the end of the first count, any candidate who has received the quota of votes or more than the quota of votes is deemed to be elected
Ag deireadh an chéad chomhairimh aon iarrthóir a bhfuil an cuóta bainte amach aige/aici nó a bhfuil níos mó vótaí aige/aici ná an cuóta fógraítear go bhfuil sé/sí tofa
When a candidate receives more than the quota of votes, their surplus of votes is proportionally transferred to the remaining candidates
Nuair a fhaigheann iarrthóir níos mó vótaí ná an cuóta déantar fuílleach a vótaí a roinnt de réir cóimheasa ar na hiarrthóirí atá fágtha le toghadh
If no candidate receives more than the quota of votes or if the surplus is not enough to elect one of the candidates, the candidate with the lowest amount of votes is eliminated

Muna bhfuil níos mó vótaí ná an cuóta faighte ag aon iarrthóir nó muna bhfuil dóthain vótaí i bhfuílleach an iarrthóra le iarrthóir eile a thoghadh déantar an t-iarrthóir leis an líon is lú vótaí a chur as an áireamh
Their papers are then transferred to the remaining candidates according to the next preference shown on them
Ansin déantar a p(h)áipéir a aistriú chuig na hiarrthóirí atá fágtha de réir an chéad rogha eile atá orthu
If a ballot paper is to be transferred and the second preference shown on it is for a candidate already elected or eliminated, the vote passes on to third choice and so on

Má tá páipéar ballóide le n-aistriú agus má tá an duine a fuair an dara rogha ar an bpáipéar sin tofa cheana nó curtha as an áireamh, téann an vóta chuig an duine a fuair an tríú rogha agus mar sin de
If it gets to the point that the number of seats left to be filled is equal to the number of candidates still in the running, these candidates are declared elected without having obtained the quota
Má thagann sé chuig an bpointe gur ionann líon na suíochán atá le líonadh agus líon na n-iarrthóirí atá fágtha fógraítear go bhfuil na hiarrthóirí sin tofa gan an cuóta a bhaint amach
